scenes.background: [Monica] leans back in her chair, crossing her arms.
scenes.description: 'We could have a structured plan to keep things organized.'

options.text: Let's create a detailed schedule to ensure everything runs smoothly.
options.analysis: You offered a practical solution to maintain order, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: It's about making everyone happy. We'll figure it out together.
options.analysis: You focused on inclusivity and teamwork, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe it's too complicated. We should choose one idea and stick to it.
options.analysis: You suggested simplifying the plan, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
